title: Algae Swirls Across a South African Reservoir
summary: Vivid green blooms form, drift, and fade in Hartbeespoortdam reservoir over the course of a year.

These shifting features indicate algae blooms, which can affect water quality, ecosystems, and nearby human communities. In this animation, from June 2022 to July 2023, an algal bloom grows, moves around the reservoir, and then fades.
